description: Ego Strengthening Configuration - Based on Hartland's classic approach, modernized

cascade.description: Benefit Cascade pattern - causal chains showing transformation
cascade.placement: Near end, after main therapeutic work, before emergence

structure.build_chains: Use connecting phrases to show causation
structure.acknowledge_momentum: One small shift creating the next
structure.tie_outcome: Until you find yourself living exactly what you came here for: [desiredOutcome]
structure.anchor_present: This isn't hope. This is the natural cascade of change already beginning in your body right now

rules: USE ALL submitted benefits but organize into logical causal chains
Each connection must be logically defensible
Create 1-3 chains depending on how benefits connect
If benefits don't all connect in one sequence, create 2-3 shorter chains
Tie all chains to client's desiredOutcome field

chunk.description: Meaningful 150-250 word segment for script ending

wake.time_reference: Day ahead (as you move through today)

sleep.tense: Gentle present (your body healing, sleep deepening)
sleep.time_reference: Night (as you rest tonight, through the night)

functional_categories.note: SELECT 3-5 TOTAL. These are EXAMPLES to inspire phrasing, not exhaustive lists.
